forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with clear skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
